General.Name: Shanghai Jiao Yun Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Shanghai Jiao Yun Group Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells auto parts in China. It also offers road freight and logistics, road passenger transport, tourism, warehousing, agency, and automobile sales and after-sales services. In addition, the company provides property management, technology training, and motor vehicle inspection and testing services. Further, the company operates electric vehicle charging infrastructure. Shanghai Jiao Yun Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.
